version_description:
- search
- ability to flip faces
- performance improvements

-Face Packs!
-Remove the GifJif watermark and add your own
-New GIFs
-Flippable faces
-Bug Fixes

- Add a meme to any gif
- Add a custom text watermark

- Add a meme to any gif
- Add a custom text watermark
- New FacePacks
- More GIFs
- Bug Fixes

-Share directly to Facebook and Slack
-More GIFs
-Enhanced Search
-Bug Fixes

GifJif Pro!! Brand new GIFs, features and tools.

In GifJif Pro, you can now:
-Add text to faces, create amazing Memes in seconds
-New “Favorites” Section, build out your own personal section of your favorite GIFs
-New face tracer which makes it easier to cut faces
-A monthly or annual subscription to access every new feature in one package
-New GIFs every single day!
Bug fixes! You can now access of the new Gifjif Pro features including Text on Faces, Favorites and Enhanced Face Cutting.

- Fixed bug where app would freeze when searching began
- Custom faces are now sorted by most recent
